titles.title: A resolution calling for the peaceful return to Cambodia of opposition party members and democracy activists.
A resolution calling for the peaceful return to Cambodia of opposition party members and democracy activists.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution calls on Cambodia to release all political prisoners and restore full political rights to the Cambodia National Rescue Party. The resolution also condemns the deterioration of human rights and democracy in Cambodia.
